events.name: Severe Weather and Tornadoes Hit Texas and Iowa
events.wd_label: Severe Weather and Tornadoes Hit Texas and Iowa
events.wd_description: Texas experienced severe weather, including thunderstorms, wind, and widespread showers, resulting in multiple tornadoes near Austin. The storms caused significant damage, injuries, and power outages, while Iowa also issued tornado warnings.
events.description: Texas experienced severe weather, including thunderstorms, wind, and widespread showers, resulting in multiple tornadoes near Austin. The storms caused significant damage, injuries, and power outages, while Iowa also issued tornado warnings.

events.name: Severe Weather in Texas
events.wd_description: Texas continued to experience severe storms, including thunderstorms, wind, and widespread showers, following a week of adverse weather conditions.
events.description: Texas continued to experience severe storms, including thunderstorms, wind, and widespread showers, following a week of adverse weather conditions.

events.name: Tornado Formation and Damage
events.wd_description: Multiple tornadoes formed near Austin, Texas, causing widespread damage, including destroyed houses, uprooted trees, and power outages, with 23 people injured.
events.description: Multiple tornadoes formed near Austin, Texas, causing widespread damage, including destroyed houses, uprooted trees, and power outages, with 23 people injured.

events.name: Tornado Warnings in Iowa
events.wd_description: The state of Iowa, located 900 miles away from Texas, issued tornado warnings as the severe weather system continued to affect the region.
events.description: The state of Iowa, located 900 miles away from Texas, issued tornado warnings as the severe weather system continued to affect the region.

events.name: Public session on Pacific weather patterns, June 2022
events.wd_label: Public session on Pacific weather patterns, June 2022
events.wd_description: US-based scientist Dr. Mike McPhaden held a public session in Sydney to discuss the current state of the Pacific, focusing on the potential for a rare triple La Niña event and its implications for Australia’s weather.
events.description: US-based scientist Dr. Mike McPhaden held a public session in Sydney to discuss the current state of the Pacific, focusing on the potential for a rare triple La Niña event and its implications for Australia’s weather.

events.name: Discussion on El Niño and La Niña
events.wd_label: Discussion on El Niño and La Niña
events.wd_description: The session covered the significance of surface temperatures in the Nino 3.4 region of the tropical Pacific Ocean in determining the occurrence of El Niño or La Niña events.
events.description: The session covered the significance of surface temperatures in the Nino 3.4 region of the tropical Pacific Ocean in determining the occurrence of El Niño or La Niña events.

events.name: Potential triple La Niña
events.wd_description: Dr. McPhaden highlighted the rarity of a triple La Niña, which could continue into 2023, bringing increased rainfall and lower temperatures to Australia’s east coast.
events.description: Dr. McPhaden highlighted the rarity of a triple La Niña, which could continue into 2023, bringing increased rainfall and lower temperatures to Australia’s east coast.

events.name: Role of global heating in weather events
events.wd_label: Role of global heating in weather events
events.wd_description: The session also touched on the potential influence of global heating on the current and future weather events, though scientists are still studying its impact on storm activities.
events.description: The session also touched on the potential influence of global heating on the current and future weather events, though scientists are still studying its impact on storm activities.

events.name: Suspension of BJP spokespersons
events.wd_description: Nupur Sharma and Naveen Kumar Jindal, spokespeople of India's ruling Party, have been suspended following their comments against the Islamic Prophet Muhammed, which led to protests in the Middle East.
events.description: Nupur Sharma and Naveen Kumar Jindal, spokespeople of India's ruling Party, have been suspended following their comments against the Islamic Prophet Muhammed, which led to protests in the Middle East.

events.name: Middle East protests
events.wd_description: Prominent Gulf countries described the comments as insulting and summoned the respective Indian ambassadors, raising concerns about Islamophobic discourse and actions against Indian Muslims.
events.description: Prominent Gulf countries described the comments as insulting and summoned the respective Indian ambassadors, raising concerns about Islamophobic discourse and actions against Indian Muslims.

events.name: BJP's initial reaction
events.wd_description: There was no initial reaction from the ruling Party, but as boycotts and sanctions grew, the government dismissed the comments as fringe elements within the Party.
events.description: There was no initial reaction from the ruling Party, but as boycotts and sanctions grew, the government dismissed the comments as fringe elements within the Party.

events.name: BJP's action
events.wd_description: Both spokespeople were fired by the BJP, which stated that strong action will be taken against individuals who make insulting statements.
events.description: Both spokespeople were fired by the BJP, which stated that strong action will be taken against individuals who make insulting statements.

events.name: Supporters' reaction
events.wd_description: Ardent supporters of the ruling Party spoke out against the decision to expel the spokespeople, calling it a cowardly act by the BJP.
events.description: Ardent supporters of the ruling Party spoke out against the decision to expel the spokespeople, calling it a cowardly act by the BJP.

events.name: CATL Launches Third-Generation CTP Qilin Battery
events.wd_label: CATL Launches Third-Generation CTP Qilin Battery
events.wd_description: On June 23, CATL unveiled the third-generation CTP Qilin battery, featuring the highest system integration globally, with a volume utilization rate exceeding 72% and an energy density of up to 255Wh/kg, enabling a range of 1000 kilometers.
events.description: On June 23, CATL unveiled the third-generation CTP Qilin battery, featuring the highest system integration globally, with a volume utilization rate exceeding 72% and an energy density of up to 255Wh/kg, enabling a range of 1000 kilometers.

events.name: Battery Performance
events.wd_description: The Qilin battery achieves a volume utilization rate exceeding 72% and an energy density of up to 255Wh/kg, allowing a range of 1000 kilometers.
events.description: The Qilin battery achieves a volume utilization rate exceeding 72% and an energy density of up to 255Wh/kg, allowing a range of 1000 kilometers.

events.name: Structural Innovations
events.wd_description: CATL has redefined battery structure design by integrating transverse and longitudinal beams, water-cooling plates, and thermal pads into a multifunctional elastic interlayer, enhancing reliability and durability.
events.description: CATL has redefined battery structure design by integrating transverse and longitudinal beams, water-cooling plates, and thermal pads into a multifunctional elastic interlayer, enhancing reliability and durability.

events.name: t: Multifunctional Elastic Interlayer
events.wd_description: The Qilin battery integrates transverse and longitudinal beams, water-cooling plates, and thermal pads into a multifunctional elastic interlayer that improves cell reliability and durability.
events.description: The Qilin battery integrates transverse and longitudinal beams, water-cooling plates, and thermal pads into a multifunctional elastic interlayer that improves cell reliability and durability.

events.name: t: Space Structure Redesign
events.wd_description: Utilizing precise calculations and AI simulations, CATL has optimized the space structure to release 6% of energy space while meeting safety standards.
events.description: Utilizing precise calculations and AI simulations, CATL has optimized the space structure to release 6% of energy space while meeting safety standards.

events.name: Thermal Management
events.wd_description: CATL introduced the world's first large-area cell cooling technology, which places water-cooling functions between cells, quadrupling the heat exchange area and halving cell temperature control time.
events.description: CATL introduced the world's first large-area cell cooling technology, which places water-cooling functions between cells, quadrupling the heat exchange area and halving cell temperature control time.

events.name: t: Fast Charging Capability
events.wd_description: The Qilin battery supports a 5-minute hot start and 10-minute fast charging, significantly improving efficiency.
events.description: The Qilin battery supports a 5-minute hot start and 10-minute fast charging, significantly improving efficiency.

events.name: t: Enhanced Safety
events.wd_description: The cooling system allows rapid temperature reduction in extreme situations, preventing abnormal heat conduction between cells and ensuring thermal stability and safety.
events.description: The cooling system allows rapid temperature reduction in extreme situations, preventing abnormal heat conduction between cells and ensuring thermal stability and safety.
